Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    de.lessvoid.nifty.render.NiftyImageMode
    use ImageModeFactory class instead to create ImageMode instances.
    de.lessvoid.nifty.tools.TimeProvider
    This implementation only exists for legacy reasons and is likely to be dropped in future versions. Better use the implementations in the package de.lessvoid.nifty.spi.time.impl
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    de.lessvoid.nifty.input.keyboard.KeyboardInputEvent.KEY_LWIN
    Use KEY_LMETA instead
    de.lessvoid.nifty.input.keyboard.KeyboardInputEvent.KEY_RWIN
    Use KEY_RMETA instead
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    de.lessvoid.nifty.builder.ElementBuilder.build(Nifty, Screen, Element)
    de.lessvoid.nifty.builder.ElementBuilder.build(Nifty, Screen, Element, int)
    de.lessvoid.nifty.builder.ElementBuilder.build(Nifty, Screen, Element, Element)
    de.lessvoid.nifty.controls.Parameters.containsKey(String)
    use Parameters.isSet(String)
    de.lessvoid.nifty.controls.Parameters.getProperty(String)
    use Parameters.get(String)
    de.lessvoid.nifty.controls.Parameters.getProperty(String, String)
    use Parameters.getWithDefault(String, String)
    de.lessvoid.nifty.elements.Element.onClick()
    Use Element.onClickAndReleasePrimaryMouseButton() instead. Simulates a click-release of the primary mouse button on the element.
    de.lessvoid.nifty.loaderv2.NiftyLoader.validateNiftyXml(InputStream)
    de.lessvoid.nifty.Nifty.executeEndOfFrameElementActions()
    Calling this function from anywhere outside Nifty is a bad idea in all cases. Nothing good comes from it.
    de.lessvoid.nifty.Nifty.scheduleEndOfFrameElementAction(Screen, Element, Action, EndNotify)
    Contains useless arguments, use Nifty.scheduleEndOfFrameElementAction(de.lessvoid.nifty.elements.Action, EndNotify)
    de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.Screen.findElementByName(String)
    de.lessvoid.nifty.tools.Alpha.mutiply(float)
    Typo in function name TODO: Remove
    de.lessvoid.nifty.tools.Color.mutiply(Color, float)
    Typo in function name. Use Color.multiply(Color, float) TODO: Remove in Nifty 2.0
    de.lessvoid.nifty.tools.SizeValue.isPercentOrPixel()
    function got renamed to SizeValue.hasValue()
    org.bushe.swing.event.EventBus.getVetoSubscribers(String)
    use getVetoSubscribersToTopic instead for direct replacement, or use getVetoEventListeners to get topic and pattern matchers. In EventBus 2.0 this name will replace getVetoEventListeners() and have it's union functionality
    org.bushe.swing.event.EventService.getVetoSubscribers(String)
    use getVetoSubscribersToTopic instead for direct replacement, or use getVetoEventListeners to get topic and pattern matchers. In EventBus 2.0 this name will replace getVetoEventListeners() and have it's union functionality
    org.bushe.swing.event.ThreadSafeEventService.getVetoSubscribers(String)
    use getVetoSubscribersToTopic instead for direct replacement, or use getVetoEventListeners to get topic and pattern matchers. In EventBus 2.0 this name will replace getVetoEventListeners() and have it's union functionality
